Class BattleEvent

The base class for Battle Events. Battle Events take over entity turns and must finish before the next entity can go. They have a priority value, with higher priorities taking precedence over lower priority events.

Examples of Battle Events include Battle Messages, entities dying or taking damage, dialogue, and Status Effect animations.

| Improve this Doc View Source

IsCombineable

Tells if the Battle Event is combineable. If it's combineable, it's also unique.

If combineable, its contents will be combined with other Battle Events of the same type with the same priority when added to take effect.

Declaration
public bool IsCombineable { get; protected set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Boolean

Property Value
Type Description
System.Boolean
| Improve this Doc View Source

IsUnique

Tells if the Battle Event is unique.

If unique, its contents will be checked for equality with other Battle Events with the same priority. If they have the same contents, other Battle Events will be disregarded.

Declaration
public bool IsUnique { get; protected set; }

System.Boolean

AreContentsEqual(BattleEvent)

Tells if this Battle Event's contents are equal to another Battle Event's contents.

The base behavior is to compare this Battle Event to the Battle Event passed in.

Declaration
public virtual bool AreContentsEqual(BattleEvent other)
